thread.title: ‘Panthers’ offers a nuanced portrait of tumultuous times
thread.title_full: ‘Panthers’ offers a nuanced portrait of tumultuous times - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Peter Hartlaub
title: ‘Panthers’ offers a nuanced portrait of tumultuous times
text:
Photo: Dave Randolph, The Chronicle San Francisco Police raid Black Panthers in the Fillmore District April 28, 1969 San Francisco Police raid Black Panthers in the Fillmore District...
“We were making history, and it wasn’t nice and clean,” former Black Panther member Ericka Huggins says at the beginning of “The Black Panthers: Vanguard of the Revolution.” San Francisco Police raid Black Panthers in the Fillmore District April 28, 1969 San Francisco Police raid Black Panthers in the Fillmore District...
“We were making history, and it wasn’t nice and clean,” former Black Panther member Ericka Huggins says at the beginning of “The Black Panthers: Vanguard of the Revolution.”
